name: The Fighteggs
description:
The Fighteggs is a local multiplayer game about thrilling egg-smashing battles (where you are the egg). 

Your goal is to make your enemy fall to the ground.

To do so, you can get some help from your fists and PUNCH THEM IN THE FACE!!!

PLAYER 1 CONTROLS:

  • Use A and D to balance yourself left or right
  • Use W to jump
  • Use SPACE to PUNCH!!!

PLAYER 2 CONTROLS:

  • Use LEFT ARROW and RIGHT ARROW to balance yourself left or right
  • Use UP ARROW to jump
  • Use ENTER to PUNCH!!!

HOW TO PLAY ONLINE:

Unfortunately, The Fighteggs doesn't officially support online multiplayer yet, but you can play with your friends online using Parsec (https://parsec.app/).

LUDUM DARE JAM

This game was made during the Ludum Dare 49 event. You can check our LD page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/the-fighteggs

If you also participated, please leave us some ratings/comments!

AUTHORS

Laura González Pascual (artist) 

Mario Tabasco Vargas (designer/programmer/sounds*)

*almost every sound in the game was made using Mario's real-life mouth.
